net.trajano.auth

Class GoogleAuthModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.auth.OAuthModule
      • net.trajano.auth.GoogleAuthModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.security.auth.message.config.ServerAuthContext, javax.security.auth.message.module.ServerAuthModule, javax.security.auth.message.ServerAuth

    public class GoogleAuthModule
extends OAuthModule
    Google Server Auth Module. Uses Google services to do OAuth 2.0 Login. It extends OAuthModule to get the configuration from the module rather from Google.
    Author:
    Archimedes Trajano

      • getToken

        protected OAuthToken getToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                  OpenIDProviderConfiguration oidProviderConfig)
                       throws IOException
        Only does the passing of the authentication token via the POST parameters and does not try to do it via the authorization headers. Sends a request to the token endpoint to get the token for the code.
        Overrides:
        getToken in class OAuthModule
        Parameters:
        req - servlet request
        oidProviderConfig - OpenID provider config
        Returns:
        token response
        Throws:
        IOException
